title: Checking in at the Hotel
desc: Learn how to check in at a hotel, including asking about reservations, showing ID, and getting directions to your room.
prompt_en: You are at a hotel reception desk. Practice checking in by asking about reservations, providing your name, and requesting directions to your room.
prompt_zh: 你在飯店櫃檯。練習辦理入住手續，詢問訂房情況，提供姓名，並請求房間方向指引。
sample_questions: Do you have a reservation?
My reservation is under the name Scott.
Could you tell me where my room is?
Which floor is my room on?
How do I get to the elevator?

title: Asking for Directions to a Pharmacy
desc: Practice asking for and understanding directions to a nearby pharmacy.
prompt_en: You need to find a pharmacy nearby. Ask someone for directions and confirm the route.
prompt_zh: 你需要找到附近的藥局。向別人問路並確認路線。
sample_questions: Is there a pharmacy around here?
How do I get to the pharmacy?
Can you tell me if it's far?
Is it next to any landmark?
Thank you for your help.

title: Finding an ATM
desc: Learn how to ask for directions to an ATM and understand the landmarks mentioned.
prompt_en: You want to find an ATM. Ask for directions and listen carefully to the landmarks mentioned.
prompt_zh: 你想找提款機。詢問路線並仔細聽取提到的地標。
sample_questions: Can you help me find an ATM?
Where is the nearest ATM?
Do I need to cross the road?
Is the ATM inside a bank?
Thank you very much.

title: Locating the Post Office
desc: Practice asking where the post office is and understanding directions using nearby landmarks.
prompt_en: Ask someone where the post office is and follow their directions using landmarks like the museum and bank.
prompt_zh: 詢問郵局在哪裡，並根據附近的地標如博物館和銀行來理解路線。
sample_questions: Could you tell me where the post office is?
Is it far from here?
Is it near the museum?
Which corner is it on?
Thanks for your kindness.

title: Giving Directions to Someone
desc: Practice giving clear directions to someone who wants to find a place, such as the post office.
prompt_en: You are in front of the hotel. Give directions to someone on how to get to the post office.
prompt_zh: 你在飯店前面。向別人說明如何前往郵局的路線。
sample_questions: Turn right at the corner and go two blocks.
The post office is on the corner of the third block.
Do you want me to wait for you there?
How long will it take to get there?
Be careful crossing the street.

title: Asking for Directions to the Hospital
desc: Learn how to ask for directions to the hospital and handle situations when the person doesn't know the way.
prompt_en: You need to find the hospital. Ask someone for directions and respond politely if they don't know.
prompt_zh: 你需要找到醫院。向別人問路，若對方不知道，禮貌回應。
sample_questions: Could you tell me where the hospital is?
Are you from around here?
It's okay if you don't know.
Thank you anyway.
I will ask someone else.

title: Meeting Up and Finding Each Other
desc: Practice phone conversations to coordinate meeting places and give directions to meet up.
prompt_en: You are on the phone with a friend. Tell them where you are and give directions on how to meet up.
prompt_zh: 你正在和朋友通電話。告訴他你在哪裡並說明如何會合的路線。
sample_questions: Where are you now?
I'm at the post office.
How do I get there from the hotel?
I'll be there in a few minutes.
I rented a car to pick you up.

title: Asking for Directions to the Shopping Mall
desc: Learn how to ask for and understand directions to a shopping mall using landmarks like bus stops and cinemas.
prompt_en: You want to go to the shopping mall. Ask for directions and listen for landmarks mentioned.
prompt_zh: 你想去購物中心。詢問路線並聽取提到的地標。
sample_questions: Do you know where the shopping mall is?
Which way should I turn?
Is it near the cinema?
How many blocks do I need to walk?
Thank you very much.

title: Finding the Restroom
desc: Practice asking for the location of the restroom in a public place and understanding simple directions.
prompt_en: You need to find the restroom. Ask someone politely and follow their directions.
prompt_zh: 你需要找到洗手間。禮貌地詢問並跟隨指示。
sample_questions: Excuse me, do you know where the restroom is?
Is it far from here?
Which way should I go?
Thank you for your help.
It's at the end of the hall to the right.
